text: apiVersion: kustomize.toolkit.fluxed.io/vi kind: Kustomization metadata: name: postgres-cluster namespace: flux-system spect targetNamespace: databases commonMetadata: labels: app.kubernetes.io/name: postgres-cluster path: "./kubernetes/infra/databases/cloudnative-postgres/cluster" prune: true sourceRef: kind: GitRepository name: flux-system dependson: - name: metallb namespace: flux-system - name: longhorn namespace: flux-system = 8 GRIEIEANEHT namespace: flux-system decryption: provider: sops secretRef: name: sops-age wait: true interval: 36m retryInterval: im timeout: 5m
